entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
